reviewText: We got it earlier than estimated date & it plays good too! Thank you very much & have a nice day!

This video is a hit for our entire family!  We actually like it even better than the first one (The Emperor's New Groove), which is also good.  Lots of funny, witty lines/scenes.  And we prefer the VHS version (versus DVD), since it holds up much better to a 3-year-old's and 5-year-old's handling.
